content: So the morons behind Trump’s newest hard-on are the same ones to claim the Sandy Hook shooting is proof that there were zero mass shootings before 2009 (Obama.) Riiiight! And just today I saw a “true” story saying that Trump is the smartest man on Earth, but has testicles the size of BBs, and made of jelly beans. (Won’t Trump be just torn over this composite story! Can he praise a piece he hates?)
